Title: Anders Hejlsberg on why they had to fix JavaScript
Author: GitHub
Description:
Anders Hejlsberg explains the pivotal moment when the industry realized JavaScript couldn't handle massive applications without better tooling. This realization led to the rejection of "Script Sharp" (writing C# to compile to JS) and the decision to fix JavaScript itself by creating TypeScript.

#JavaScript #TypeScript #ScriptSharp
